puzzlesYaml.title: Breaking Stick
puzzlesYaml.question: The stick drops and breaks at a random point distributed uniformly across the length. What is the expected length of the smaller part?
puzzlesYaml.solution: The probability that the break point belongs to first half is 1/2. In this case, the expected length of the small part is L/4. Its L/4 in the other case too. Hence E = 1/2*L/4 + 1/2*L/4 = L/4
